overview:
Architect (US), Paul has over 20 years experience in Real Estate. He has worked internationally on large office, retail & mixed use projects in design and project management.

Paul is a passionate evangelist who wants to bring the world of Property Development to new highs of sustainable value creation, such as Community, Environment, Welfare, all in aÂ transparent and collaborative process.

He capitalizes on a very strong network of ex-customers (Corio, Unibail, Simon Properties, etc…)

He is also very keen on social networks and is actively building BloomDesk’s social brand on Internet.
